name: Christmas Gift Shooter
description:
Fun and addictive gift shoot game!
Pick up Santa's gifts.
Clear all the gifts on the screen to level up, and try to get best score on each level.
Funny levels, intelligence developer sections.
The score in the game are based on your performance, the higher the score.
You can download it free of charge for your children, your loved ones or your elderly parents.
Totally free, have fun !
